414830.name: Robotpencil Presents: Illustration Basics Package
414830.description:
Over 130 minutes of content with Workfiles.

Topics Covered:

-Finding the Mood and Composition
-Capturing the colors to set the tone
-Seperating the background and characters
-Applying light and color
-Finalizing
-Knowing if you over worked it or not

Includes;

-HiRes PSD
-HiRes JPEG
-Photoshop Brushes
-Photoshop Shapes
414830.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
